mapper.select: select a.member_code , a.member_name , a.member_id , a.member_room_image , b.follow_id , b.follower_id , b.following_id from tbl_members a left join tbl_follows b on b.follower_id = a.member_code where a.member_code = b.follower_id and b.following_id = #{memberCode} and not a.member_code = #{memberCode} and a.member_delete_yn = 'N' and b.follow_delete_yn = 'N'
